texto: When you drink tap water, what is the main source of the tap water? Is the city water supply (community water supply); a well or rain cistern; a spring; or something else?

texto: Now I'll be asking some questions about {your/NAME's} use of table salt.
label: Instrução

texto: What type of salt {do you/does NAME} usually add to {your/his/her} food at the table? Would you say it is ordinary salt, sea salt, lite salt, or a salt substitute?
label: Pergunta

texto: ORDINARY, SEA, SEASONED, OR OTHER FLAVORED SALT [includes regular iodized salt,sea salt and seasoning salts made with regular salt]
label: Resposta

texto: How often {do you/does NAME} add this salt to {your/his/her} food at the table? Is it rarely,occasionally, or very often?
label: Pergunta

texto: How often is ordinary salt or sea salt added in cooking or preparing foods in your household? Is it never, rarely, occasionally, or very often?
label: Pergunta

texto: [THIS QUESTION APPLIES ONLY TO USE OF ORDINARY SALT, SEA SALT OR SEASONED SALT AND NOT TO LITE SALT OR SALT SUBSTITUTES.]
label: Instrução

texto: This next question is about {your/NAME’s} use of salt at the table yesterday. Did {you/SP} add any salt to {your/her/his} food at the table yesterday? Salt includes ordinary salt, sea salt, lite salt, or a salt substitute.
label: Pergunta

texto: What type of salt was it? (Was it ordinary salt, sea salt, lite salt, or a salt substitute?)

texto: Please look at this list of fish
label: Instrução

texto: During the past 30 days, did you eat any types of fish listed on this card? Include any foods that had fish in them such as sandwiches, soups, or salads.
label: Pergunta

texto: During the past 30 days, which types of fish did you eat and how many times did you eat them?
label: Pergunta

texto: Type listed: breaded fish products, tuna (canned or fresh), bass, catfish, cod, flatfish, haddock,mackerel, perch, pike, pollock, porgy, salmon, sardines, sea bass, shark, swordfish, trout, walleye,other type of fish and unknown type of fish.
label: Instrução

texto: Interviewer instruction:Check each type of shellfish the SP reports eating, and then ask and record the number of times each type was eaten
label: Instrução

texto: Please look at this list of shellfish.
label: Instrução

texto: During the past 30 days, did you eat any types of shellfish listed on this card? Include any foods that had shellfish in them such as sandwiches, soups, or salads.
label: Pergunta

texto: During the past 30 days, which types of shellfish did you eat and how many times did you eat them?
label: Pergunta

texto: Type listed: clams, crab, crayfish (crawfish), lobster, mussels, oysters, scallops, shrimp, other shellfish (for example, octopus, squid) and unknown type of shellfish.
label: Instrução

texto: The next questions are about {your/SP's} recent health during the 30 days outlined on the calendar.
label: Instrução

texto: Did {you/SP} have a head cold or chest cold that started during those 30 days?
label: Pergunta

texto: Did {you/SP} have a stomach or intestinal illness with vomiting or diarrhea that started during those 30 days?
label: Pergunta

texto: Did {you/SP} have flu, pneumonia, or ear infections that started during those 30 days?
label: Pergunta

texto: In the past 7 days, were any chemical products used in {your/his/her} home to control fleas, roaches,ants, termites, or other insects?
label: Pergunta

texto: In the past 7 days, were any chemical products used in {your/his/her} lawn or garden to kill weeds?
label: Pergunta

texto: CODE ‘NO’ IF THE RESPONDENT SAYS S/HE DOES NOT HAVE A LAWN OR GARDEN.
label: Instrução

texto: The next question is about drinking alcoholic beverages. Included are liquor (such as whiskey or gin), beer, wine,wine coolers, and any other type of alcoholic beverage. By a drink, I mean a 12 oz. beer, a 5 oz. glass of wine, orone and a half ounces of liquor
label: Instrução

texto: ALQ1 (Here are some examples of an alcoholic drink)
label: Instrução

texto: Considering all types of alcoholic beverages, during the past 30 days, how many times did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks on an occasion?
label: Pergunta

texto: SOFT EDIT: IF RESPONSE IS > 60 TIMES, THEN DISPLAY “YOU SAID THAT IN THE PAST 30 DAYS, YOU HAD {DISPLAY NUMBER} OR MORE DRINKS OF ANY KIND OF ALCOHOL ON AN OCCASION, (DISPLAY QUANTITY) TIMES. IS THAT CORRECT”?
label: Pergunta

texto: The following questions ask about use of tobacco products in the past 5 days.
label: Instrução

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, did {you/he/she} smoke cigarettes, pipes, cigars, little cigars or cigarillos, water pipes, hookahs, or e-cigarettes?
label: Pergunta

texto: Which of these products did {you/he/she} smoke?
label: Pergunta

texto: Cigars, or little cigars, or cigarillos
label: Resposta

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on how many days did {you/he/she} smoke cigarettes?
label: Pergunta

texto: IF R SAYS 95 OR MORE CIGARETTES PER DAY, ENTER 95.
label: Instrução

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on the days {you/he/she} smoked, how many cigarettes did {you/he/she} smoke each day?
label: Pergunta

texto: When did {you/he/she} smoke {your/his/her} last cigarette? Was it . . .

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on how many days did {you/he/she} smoke a pipe?

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on how many days did {you/he/she} smoke cigars, or little cigars or cigarillos?
label: Pergunta

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on how many days did {you/he/she} smoke tobacco in a water pipe or Hookah?
label: Pergunta

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on how many days did {you/he/she} smoke an e-cigarette?
label: Pergunta

texto: Smokeless tobacco products are placed in the mouth or nose and include chewing tobacco, snuff, snus, or dissolvables.

texto: (Please do not include nicotine replacement products like patches, gum, lozenge, or spray which are considered products to help {you/him/her} stop smoking.)

texto: During the past 5 days, including today, on how many days did {you/he/she} use snuff, such as Skoal, Skoal Bandits, or Copenhagen?
label: Pergunta

label: Pergunta

label: Pergunta

label: Pergunta

texto: When did {you/he/she} last use a nicotine replacement therapy product? Was it . . .
label: Pergunta

texto: The next questions are about {your/his/her} exposure to other people’s tobacco smoke.
label: Instrução

texto: During the last 7 days, did {you/SP} spend time in a restaurant?
label: Pergunta

texto: While {you were/SP was} in a restaurant, did someone else smoke cigarettes or other tobacco products indoors?
label: Pergunta

texto: During the last 7 days, did {you/SP} ride in a car or motor vehicle?
label: Pergunta

texto: While {you were/SP was} riding in a car or motor vehicle, did someone else smoke cigarettes or other tobacco products?
label: Pergunta

label: Pergunta

texto: While {you were/SP was} in a home other than {your/his/her} own, did someone else smoke cigarettes or other tobacco products indoors?
label: Pergunta

texto: During the last 7 days, {were you/was SP} in any other indoor area?
label: Pergunta

texto: While {you were/SP was} in the other indoor area, did someone else smoke cigarettes or other tobacco products?
label: Pergunta

label: Instrução

texto: During the last 7 days, {were you/was SP} in an indoor place where someone was using an e-cigarette, e-hookah, vape-pen or other similar electronic product?
label: Pergunta

texto: Lactaid: A modified milk product that is often consumed by individuals who have lactose intolerance. Lactaid can be purchased in various forms (i.e., 2%, skim, etc.). If respondent does not give type, probe for type (i.e., was that Lactaid regular, 2%, 1% or skim?).

texto: Formula: A milk mixture or milk substitute that is fed to babies.

texto: The next questions are about meals provided by community or government programs.
label: Instrução

texto: In  the  past  12  months,  did  {you/SP}  receive  any  meals  delivered  to  {your/his/her}  home  from  community  programs, “Meals on Wheels”, or any other programs?
label: Pergunta

label: Pergunta

label: Pergunta

label: Instrução

label: Pergunta

texto: Next are a few questions about the WIC program.
label: Instrução

texto: Has {SP} ever received benefits from WIC, that is, the Women, Infants, and Children program?
label: Pergunta

texto: WIC:  WIC is short for the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children. This program provides  food  assistance  and  nutritional  screening  to  low-income  pregnant  and  postpartum  women  and  their  infants, as well as to low-income children up to age 5.
label: Instrução

texto: Is {SP} now receiving benefits from the WIC program?
label: Pergunta

texto: Did {SP} receive benefits from WIC when {he/she} was less than one year old?
label: Pergunta

texto:
Did {SP} receive benefits from WIC when {he/she} {was/is} between the ages of {1 to {SP AGE/4} years old/12 to 
{SP AGE} months old}?
label: Pergunta

texto: If SP age = 1, DISPLAY “12 to {the current age of the SP in months} months old”;
label: Instrução

texto: If SP age >3, DISPLAY “1 to 4 years old”.
label: Instrução

texto: How long {did SP receive/has SP been receiving} benefits from the WIC program?
label: Pergunta

texto: IF FSQ.673 = 1, DISPLAY HAS SP BEEN RECEIVING
label: Instrução

texto: Did {SP’s} mother receive benefits from WIC, while she was pregnant with {SP}?
label: Pergunta

texto: How many months pregnant was {SP’s} mother when she began to receive WIC benefits?
label: Pergunta

texto: Next I’m going to ask you about meals.  By meal, I mean breakfast, lunch and dinner.  During the past 7 days, how many meals {did you/did SP} get that were prepared away from home in places such as restaurants, fast food places, food stands, grocery stores, or from vending machines?
label: Pergunta

texto:

meals provided as part of the community programs you reported earlier.}

label: Instrução

label: Pergunta

label: Instrução
